wikipedia_page.main: Florence Aylward (10 March 1862 – 14 October 1950) was an English composer known for ballads.

link_mentions.page: List of women composers by birth date

response: Florence Aylward (1862–1950), a composer known for her ballads, was the daughter of a Rector at Brede and was born at the Rectory.
*Florence Aylward (1862–1950), English composer known for ballads, born at Brede rectory

Library. Newark, Delaware. 1994, p. 7. One of her better-known poems is Beloved, It Is Morn.A transcript of the poem Beloved, It Is Morn. The poem has been set to music by composer Florence Aylward and recorded by tenors Charles Hackett and Harry Anthony.
